title: Readout of the Secretary-Generals meeting with H.E. Mr. Salaheddine Mezouar, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Morocco
content: The Secretary-General met today with H. E. Mr. Salaheddine Mezouar, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Morocco. The Secretary-General underlined the importance of making progress in the Western Sahara negotiating process. The Secretary-General thanked Mr. Mezouar for Morocco's support for UN efforts in Libya.
